item.title: Aqualung Without Jethro
item.description: Aqualung -Jethro Yep, that’s the search key to use if you want to look up on Google information for this incredible artist. I want to start this new category, “lets-take-a-break”, where sometime I will share some of my favourite ways of taking a break. Most of the time is listening to some my favourite music artists. And today, I’ll start with Aqualung. He’s an incredibly elegant and talented british artist. In his music, you can listen influences from the best inspirations out there: Beatles, Tears for Fears, Radiohead, Bon Iver, and others.
